com.hazelcast.spi.impl.operationservice.impl

Class Invocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.spi.impl.operationservice.impl.Invocation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OperationResponseHandler

    public abstract class Invocation
extends Object
implements OperationResponseHandler
    Evaluates the invocation of an Operation.

    Using the InvocationFuture, one can wait for the completion of an invocation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      long firstInvocationTimeMillis
      The first time this invocation got executed.

      The Operation this invocation is evaluating.

      • firstInvocationTimeMillis

        public final long firstInvocationTimeMillis
        The first time this invocation got executed. This field is used to determine how long an invocation has actually been running.
